short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make Aules better looking and more useful

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Aules platform for students and teachers that we use in Valencia is pretty ugly, this extension aims to fix that.

Remember this is a project that I'm developing during my free time and that some bugs may emerge. If so, send me an email or post a comment, thanks!
